text: Livain anabamɨn ikɨzibar gumazir dapaniba uan doziba ko, ingangarir manam damusɨ satu gikararang Livain anabamɨn ikɨzibav kemeghtɨ, me a damuam. Aronɨn ikɨzimɨn ofa gamir gumaziba, kar men aveghbuaba, me amizir arazibar mɨrara me dagh ami. Ezɨ Atrivim Devit, ko Sadok, ko Ahimelek, ko ofa gamir gumaziba ko Livaibar ikɨzibar gumazir dapaniba, me bar moghɨra men garima, me satu gikararai.
